participant_1.background:
I am passionate about being crafty and working with my hands.
i like to shop.
I like to stay away from big crowds, so Comic Con isn't my thing.
i am the leader of the french fry research department at del taco.
i do not drink alcohol.

participant_2.background:
I don't own a home, but I do enjoy playing music and interacting with my listeners.
I enjoy reading about cycling because of my family's passion for it.
my favorite music is jimi hendrix.
My favorite thing about my last vacation was eating at the local restaurants.
i like to go for bike rides.

content.text: Hi there! What do you like to do for fun?
Hi! I love playing music and going for bike rides.
That sounds fun! I love to cook and bake. I also like to go shopping.
What is your favorite thing about cooking?
I love creating new dishes and seeing the look on people's faces when they taste them.
That sounds really fun! I'm not very good at cooking, but I like to try new recipes.
You should try my recipe for chocolate chip cookies! They're really easy to make and they're always a hit.
I love chocolate chip cookies! I'll have to try your recipe.
Great! Let me know what you think.
I will! What's your favorite Jimi Hendrix song?
It's hard to choose just one, but I really love "Purple Haze."
That's a great song! I also like "All Along the Watchtower."
Those are both great songs! I love his music.
Me too! He's one of my favorite musicians.
